data.actual_result: The music continues forever and you can play it to your friends
data.expected_result: After 30 consecutive seconds, spotify is automatically stopped and the red spotify banner appears on top of your client
data.short_description: Spotify will continue to play after 30 seconds of consecutive transmitting in voice chat
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a cool voice chat - play spotify through your phone or your computer and make sure it shows as your playing status! - transmit 30 consecutive seconds. This can be either spotify from your phone, or any other creative way (like playing a video while spotify is also playing)
